t=input()
for k in range(t):
  l=input()
  pie=raw_input()
  rack=raw_input()
  count=0
  pie=map(int,pie.split())
  rack=map(int,rack.split())
  pie=sorted(pie,reverse=1)
  rack=sorted(rack,reverse=1)
  for i in pie:
    for j in rack:
      if i<=j:  
        rack.remove(j)
        count+=1
        
        break
  print count
